Description: Sahara Petrochemicals Co (known as: Sahara) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since July 2004. Sahara operates within the Materials sector focusing on Commodity Chemicals. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Commodity Chemicals and Specialty Chemicals. Sahara is based in Jubail, Saudi Arabia and was established in May 2004.
